name: Adventure Time Inspired | Space Shooter
description: Join Finn and Jake on their epic intergalactic journey in Adventure Time Inspired Space Shooter! In this endless space shooter game, you'll blast your way through waves of enemies and navigate through treacherous asteroid fields with your trusty spaceship. With stunning graphics inspired by the beloved animated series "Adventure Time,"  you'll experience a truly immersive and unforgettable adventure as you battle to save the galaxy from evil forces. So, grab your weapons, strap in, and get ready for a wild ride through the farthest reaches of space!
